list_definition.definition: a mass of tiny drops of water floating in the sky

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: white clouds in a blue sky

list_definition.definition: a great number or quantity of anything small moving together

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The sky clouded over and it began to rain.

list_definition.definition: to (cause to) become blurred or not clear

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her eyes were clouded with tears.

list_definition.definition: to (cause to) become gloomy or troubled

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: His face clouded at the unhappy news.
